name: Auditing and Interactions
text: Auditing related to current consumer interaction including counting ad impressions and verifying positioning and quality

name: Security and Fraud Prevention
text: Detecting security incidents protecting against malicious deceptive fraudulent or illegal activity

name: Debugging
text: Debugging to identify and repair errors that impair existing intended functionality

name: Short-term Transient Use
text: Short-term transient use not disclosed to third party and not used to build consumer profile

name: Performing Services
text: Performing services on behalf of business including account customer service order fulfillment financing advertising marketing and analytics

name: Internal Research
text: Undertaking internal research for technological development and demonstration

name: Quality and Safety
text: Undertaking activities to verify or maintain quality or safety of services or devices

name: Operational Purposes
text: Other notified purposes that are reasonably necessary and proportionate to business purposes or consumer expectations
